msbt.message: So, you had Tom Nook build you a houseone with solid walls and everything! How posh, darling! Anyhoo, this is surely to be the start of great things for you here on , .
My my, , you've been a busy little bee. Your home is positively gigantic! It's no small feat to build a home of this magnitude. I'm terribly impressed. Truly I am, .

Have you been to Nook's Cranny since the renovations?Not only is it larger, it offers a far wider variety of products as well!As you can imagine, there are not words to express how happy that makes this ! Next time I see Timmy and Tommy, I'm going to hug them so tight they might just pop, !

The museum is ready at last!My, but we've all been looking forward to this moment for some time, haven't we? To be honest, I never expected it to be as grand as it is. Well done, Blathers, well done, .

At last! We have our own tailor shop!And it is beautifully designedas one would expect from a proprietor of fashionable wares, of course. I, for one, am just relieved to know that we can all step up our style game now, . I don't want to suggest that style— or the lack thereof—has been an issue here on the island, but... let's be real Enough with the "island casual" already.

The new path is really something, isn't it, ?At long last, one can get to the top of the cliffs without breaking a sweat. You KNOW how much I hate to sweat, darling.Of course, the view from up there is rather nice too.
So, that new arrival of ours anything I should know, my dear? Are you two close? I don't mean to pry, , I just want to know how best to make them feel welcome on the island.
Why, , have you been to the museum since the art exhibit opened? Getting to see brilliant works of art here on an island of all places is truly fabulous, no? I feel more cultured already, !
